entry.title: Introduction to my portfolio
entry.content:
## This is an overview to my portfolio
- [Education](/education/) : This includes details about my education. - [Academia](/academia/) : This includes all the academic,national and international duties and responsibilities I've held and also various workshops I've conducted. - [Experience](/experience/): This includes my professional experience as well as special courses and curriculum designed by me. - [Research](/research/): This includes all of my research contributions as an author, reviewer and even editor. - [About](/about/): This is an overview of myself and also various awards and achievements that I've received.
entry.summary: This is an overview to my portfolio
